sentences.cn: 用 and 连接的并列分句

sentences.en: How does the body coordinate these components into the finely blended mixture we call blood?
sentences.cn: 人体怎样把这些成分调配成我们称之为血液的组合得很精细的混合物 呢 ?

sentences.en: In Fig. 6 - 1 ( c ), the motion of a particle is referred to by a rectangular coordinate system.
sentences.cn: 在图6-1 ( c ) 中, 质点的运动是用直角坐标系来描述的.

sentences.en: Just how Fermat's ideas on coordinate geomitry evolved is not known.
sentences.cn: Fermat的坐标几何究竟是怎样产生的,我们尚不知道.

sentences.en: Later in the chapter we discuss how to coordinate interaction design with industrial design.
sentences.cn: 在本章后面,我们将讨论如何综合运用交互设计和工业设计.

sentences.en: Life can be made simpler by a wise choice of coordinate axes.
sentences.cn: 坐标轴选取得好就可以使问题简化.

sentences.en: Matching bag and accessories provide a complete ensemble of colour coordinates.
sentences.cn: 颜色协调的包和饰品使全套服装的颜色搭配齐全了。

sentences.en: Maybe we can coordinate the relation of them.
sentences.cn: 或许我们可以调和他们之间的关系.

sentences.en: The agencies are working together to co-ordinate policy on food safety.
sentences.cn: 这些机构在共同合作为食品安全政策做协调工作。

sentences.en: The army, navy and air forces are coordinate armed services.
sentences.cn: 陆军 、 海军和空军是并行的军种.

sentences.en: The variational parameter multiplying each coordinate is called a scale factor.
sentences.cn: 每个坐标所乘的变分参数叫定标因子.

sentences.en: They appointed a new manager to coordinate the work of the team.
sentences.cn: 为协调这个队的工作，他们任用了一位新经理。

sentences.en: This coordinate system is called the triad at the point.
sentences.cn: 这个坐标系叫做该点的三面形坐标系.

sentences.en: Two perpendicular lines are chosen as the x and y coordinate axes.
sentences.cn: 选两条垂线作为x和y坐标轴.

sentences.en: We coordinate the reports from the overseas divisions, and send them on to headquarters in Athens.
sentences.cn: 我们整理了海外各部门的报告然后再将其转发给雅典的总部。

sentences.en: We should coordinate what we will say.
sentences.cn: 我们应该协调一下我们该说什么.

sentences.en: You must coordinate the movements of your arms and legs when swimming.
sentences.cn: 游泳时你必须使臂和腿的动作相协调。

sentences.en: You must coordinate what you said with what you did.
sentences.cn: 你必须使你的言行一致.

words.tran_cn: 同等的；使…协调的；配位价的
协调者；[自] 协调器；同等的人或物
调整；使调和（coordinate的过去分词）；调节；整理

phrases.tran_cn: 坐标量测仪，坐标度量仪
坐标测量[检测]机；三元测定器
局部坐标系；地方坐标系统
极坐标；极座标；极坐标系统

trans.tran_en: equal in importance or rank in a sentence
one of a set of numbers which give the exact position of a point on a map, computer screen etc
to organize an activity so that the people involved in it work well together and achieve a good result
to organize an activity so that the people involved in it work well together and achieve a good result
